metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for corporate gathering

extracted_section.section_title: o Layer potatoes in the dish, seasoning with salt and pepper.
o Drain on paper towels and serve.

sub_section_analysis.refined_text:
o Layer potatoes in the dish, seasoning with salt and pepper.  
o Mix cream, milk, and minced garlic, pour over potatoes.  
o Sprinkle with grated Gruyère cheese.  
o Bake for 45 minutes until golden and bubbly.  
o Serve warm.  
 
Greek Salad  
• Ingredients : 
o 4 tomatoes  
o 1 cucumber  
o 1 small red onion  
o 1/4 cup olives  
o 1/4 cup feta cheese  
o 1/4 cup olive oil  
o 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar  
o 1 teaspoon oregano  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
• Instructions : 
o Dice tomatoes and cucu...

o Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).  
o Slice baguette in half lengthwise.  
o Mix softened butter with minced garlic, chopped parsley, and salt.  
o Spread mixture on bread.  
o Bake for 10 -15 minutes until golden.  
o Serve warm.  
 
Gazpacho  
• Ingredients : 
o 4 tomatoes  
o 1 cucumber  
o 1 small red onion  
o 1 bell pepper  
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 1/4 cup olive oil  
o 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper  
• Instructions : 
o Dice tomatoes, cucumber, on...

o Drain on paper towels and serve.  
 
Farofa  
• Ingredients : 
o 2 cups cassava flour  
o 1/4 cup butter  
o 1 small onion  
o 2 cloves garlic  
o 1/4 cup bacon  
o 1/4 cup parsley  
o 1 teaspoon salt  
• Instructions : 
o Sauté diced bacon, onion, and minced garlic in butter until crispy.  
o Add cassava flour and cook, stirring constantly, until golden.  
o Stir in chopped parsley and salt.  
o Serve warm.
